import React, { useState } from 'react'; const BrandAssets = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [filterType, setFilterType] = useState('all'); const [showUploadModal, setShowUploadModal] = useState(false); const [brandInfo, setBrandInfo] = useState({ logo: '/src/assets/logopurple.png', tagline: 'Empowering businesses with innovative solutions', blurb: 'We help companies streamline their operations and achieve their goals through cutting-edge technology and strategic insights.', colors: ['#6366F1', '#8B5CF6', '#EC4899', '#F59E0B'] }); const assets = [ { id: 1, name: 'Primary Logo', type: 'logo', format: 'PNG', size: '2.3 MB', uploaded: '2024-01-15', url: '/assets/logo-primary.png' }, { id: 2, name: 'Logo White', type: 'logo', format: 'SVG', size: '45 KB', uploaded: '2024-01-15', url: '/assets/logo-white.svg' }, { id: 3, name: 'Brand Guidelines', type: 'document', format: 'PDF', size: '8.7 MB', uploaded: '2024-01-10', url: '/assets/brand-guidelines.pdf' }, { id: 4, name: 'Social Media Icons', type: 'icon', format: 'ZIP', size: '1.2 MB', uploaded: '2024-01-08', url: '/assets/social-icons.zip' } ]; const assetTypes = [ { value: 'all', label: 'All Types' }, { value: 'logo', label: 'Logos' }, { value: 'icon', label: 'Icons' }, { value: 'document', label: 'Documents' }, { value: 'image', label: 'Images' } ]; const filteredAssets = assets.filter(asset => { const matchesSearch = asset.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); const matchesFilter = filterType === 'all' || asset.type === filterType; return matchesSearch && matchesFilter; }); const handleColorChange = (index, color) => { const newColors = [...brandInfo.colors]; newColors[index] = color; setBrandInfo({ ...brandInfo, colors: newColors }); }; return (

Brand Assets

{/* Brand Info Section */}

setBrandInfo({ ...brandInfo, tagline: e.target.value })} className="block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 sm:text-sm" />
